product_name: Woods Double Comfort Sleeping Bag - Double - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Sized for 2 people, the Woods Double Comfort Sleeping Bag is stuffed with synthetic insulation and features a cozy cotton flannel lining for warmth on your 3-season car-camping adventures. Synthetic insulation provides good warmth down to about 32degF. Rectangular shape with zippers on each side. Closeout.
short_description: Sized for 2 people, the Woods Double Comfort Sleeping Bag is stuffed with synthetic insulation and features a cozy cotton flannel lining for warmth on your 3-season car-camping adventures.
